#This pages gives you all informations for compiling Rolisteam.

= Dependencies =

==GNU/Linux==
*Qt4 (>= 4.4)
*Phonon

==Windows==
*Qt4
*fmod

= Compilation command =

==All platforms==
$ qmake
$ make

the software will be created in the bin directory.
